annotations.description:
Provides a PostgreSQL database on CentOS 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/tree/master/9.6/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of PostgreSQL available on OpenShift, including major versions updates.

Provides a PostgreSQL 9.2 database on CentOS 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/tree/master/9.2/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 9.4 database on CentOS 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/tree/master/9.4/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 9.5 database on CentOS 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/tree/master/9.5/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 9.6 database on CentOS 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/tree/master/9.6/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 10 database on CentOS 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/tree/master/10/README.md.
